item.title: Who is Kevin Warsh, Trump's pick to succeed Jerome Powell as Fed chair?
item.description: President Donald Trump announced on Friday that he is nominating former Federal Reserve Governor Kevin Warsh to become chairman of the central bank.

item.title: Lawmakers react to Trump nominating Kevin Warsh for Federal Reserve chairman

item.title: Grocery store edges out Publix as America's favorite
item.description: Trader Joe's beat Publix in the American Customer Satisfaction Index 2026 supermarket rankings after the two chains previously tied in 2025.
